name: Anghelo Amir
title: Web Developer
introtext: Passionate programmer and pursuing a career in web development, especially in React JS and React Native. As he found love in this framework; they were fun and challenging to do. Besides, can do design and IT related stuff. Being a fast learner and performing many trials and errors is the key to complete any programming task.

projects.name: Gala: Virtual Tour Guide for the City of Santa Rosa Laguna
projects.description: A fully featured mobile application for the tourist of Santa Rosa City. It features a GPS navigation, online forum, and addtional features that a tourist will needs! Created using React Native Expo for our Capstone Project.

projects.name: My Porfolio in React.js
projects.description: This porfolio website is created using React.js with Typescript and Sass. It is stutured in a very REUSABLE fashion. By changing the values in src/Database.porfolioinfo.json, one can reuse this temple. Yes! you are freely to reuse it.
